weapons.name: The Light of Sonnstahl
weapons.description: Hand Weapon enchantment. Attacks made with this weapon wound automatically, always have Armour Penetration 10, and Magical Attacks.

weapons.name: Death Warrant
weapons.description: Hand Weapon enchantment. Attacks made with this weapon gain Battle Focus and Magical Attacks. If a hit is scored with it against an enemy unit, friendly models with Parent Unit or Support Unit gain Battle Focus with attacks allocated against the same enemy unit in the same Phase in subsequent Initiative Steps.

weapons.name: Hammer of Witches
weapons.description: Hand Weapon enchantment. The bearer has its Attack Value set to 5 when using this weapon, and attacks made with it gain Battle Focus (against Channel) and Magical Attacks.

armours.name: Imperial Sea
armours.description: - Models on foot only. Plate Armour enchantment. The wearer gains +3 Armour and +1 Discipline. The wearer’s unit cannot voluntarily declare Flee as a Charge Reaction.

armours.name: Blacksteel
armours.description: Plate Armour enchantment. The wearer gains +1 Armour and Fear. If taken by a model on foot, the wearer gains an additional +1 Armour.

armours.name: Witchfire Guard
armours.description: Shield enchantment. The bearer gains Aegis (5+, against Magical Attacks). Miscasts suffered by enemy models within 12 of the bearer gain a +1 Miscast Modifier

armours.name: Shield of Volund
armours.description: Shield enchantment. While using this Shield, attacks against the bearer with Lethal Strike and/or Battle Focus lose these Attack Attributes

artefacts.name: Winter Cloak
artefacts.description: The bearer gains Distracting, Aegis (5+), and Aegis (2+, against Flaming Attacks).

artefacts.name: Locket of Sunna
artefacts.description: When fighting in a Duel, choose a single model part of the model that the bearer is fighting with. This cannot be a model part with Harnessed or Inanimate. The bearer must swap its Characteristic values of Strength, Armour Penetration, Resilience, Agility, and Attack Value with those of the chosen model part. This is done before applying other modifiers.

artefacts.name: Exemplar’s Flame
artefacts.description: Wizards only. Choose a single Parent Unit after Spell Selection (at step 8 of the Pre-Game Sequence). At the start of any friendly Melee Phase, if the bearer is within 18 of the chosen unit, the controlling player may choose to discard a single Veil Token from their Veil Token pool to grant all R&F model in the chosen unit Lethal Strike and Magical Attacks until the end of the Phase.

artefacts.name: Mantle of Ullor
artefacts.description: Enemy units within 6 of the bearer do not gain +1 Agility for Charging Momentum.

artefacts.name: Karadon´s Courser
artefacts.description: Knight Commanders and Marshals mounted on Horse only. One use only. May be activated at the start of any friendly Player Turn. For the duration of this Player Turn, all friendly units within 6 of the bearer must reroll failed Charge Range rolls.

standards.name: Household Standard
standards.description: If the General is part of the bearer’s unit, its Commanding Presence range and the range within which it can issue Orders (if it has Orders) are both increased by 6.

standards.name: Banner of Unity
standards.description: Parent Units only. Whenever the bearer’s unit is targeted by an Order, an additional Order can be given (for free) to a single Support Unit within 6 of the bearer’s unit.

standards.name: Marksman’s Pennant
standards.description: The bearer’s unit does not suffer the -1 to hit penalty for Stand and Shoot Charge Reactions.

choices.name: Replace Halberd with Lance and Shield
Replace Pistol with Light Lance and Shield
Replace Pistol with Brace of Pistols (4+)
